title.rendered: Vacation Reboot Hits a Snag: Production Delayed

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Production on the upcoming Vacation movie has been delayed. The film has hit a roadblock amongst the development team, with some wanting to make it an R-rated comedy, while others want to keep it PG-13.

Ed Helms is set to star in the reboot, playing Rusty Griswold, the son of Chevy Chase’s character in the original series.

Christina Applegate will be playing Rusty’s wife.

 

The disagreement has suspended the planned July start-date at least a few months. It is unclear who is on which side of the argument, or how much of a role the studio is taking in the talks.

Ed Helms can next be seen in the upcoming comedy The Hangover Part III.
